From SANYS) [Contractor]" 
To: (USANYS)" )" raillir 
)"
Cc: lir (USANYS) Contractor]" ' 
Subject: RE: US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) - discovery production 
Date: Mon, 04 Oct 2021 15:45:28 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.10.04 MDC -  Maxwell MAIN.docx; 2021.10.04 MDC -
Maxwell PASSWORD.docx 
The production has been shared with them on USAfx and the disc is ready to get sent out to MDC. Can you please confirm 
the attached cover letters are good to go? 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Monday, October 4, 2021 11:33 AM 
To: Christian Everdell Mark S. Cohen 
Laura Menninger   
/ Jeff 
Pagliuc 
Cc: 
‹MM> 
(USANYS) [Contractor] 
Subject: US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) - discovery production 
Counsel, 
We have an additional discovery production ready to send to you today. Attached please find the accompanying cover 
letter. The production will be made via USAfx. 
USANYS) [Contractor] < 
Bobbi Sternheim 
We will send a CD with the new production to the MDC for Ms. Maxwell. If you would prefer that she receive the 
production on a drive, we can either request that the MDC send us one of the drives back to load with the production, or 
we can load a new drive if you would like to provide us with one. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
EFTA00018837
